title: Star Driver: Kagayaki no Takuto
title_jp: STAR DRIVER 輝きのタクト
synopsis: To the south of Japan, there lies a lush green island called Southern Cross Isle. One night, a boy by the name of Takuto Tsunashi washes up on the shore of the island. Having swum from the mainland alone and without any possessions, he enrolls in the senior high level in the school on the island - Southern Cross High School.
